sys_script_include.name: getDelRecords

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_b80f4883db846010819f62dc1396196b
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_snc_delegated_au.getDelRecords</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>getDelRecords</name><script><![CDATA[function getDelRecords(){
	gs.info('svk');
	var recs = [];
	var grDelegates = new GlideRecord('x_snc_delegated_au_delegated_authorities');
	grDelegates.addQuery('u_user', gs.getUserID());
	grDelegates.query();
	while(grDelegates.next()){
		recs.push(grDelegates.u_authority_type.toString());
	}
	gs.info('svk '+recs.toString());
	return 'sys_idIN'+ recs.toString();
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Vincent.Hou</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-10-28 12:12:46</sys_created_on><sys_id>b80f4883db846010819f62dc1396196b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getDelRecords</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Delegated Authority Limits" source="x_snc_delegated_au">0dca54621be5d8100e7543f28d4bcbc6</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Delegated Authority Limits">0dca54621be5d8100e7543f28d4bcbc6</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_b80f4883db846010819f62dc1396196b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Vincent.Hou</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-10-28 12:18:51</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
